notes.text: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Fix closing Popover with ComboBox
sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
sap.m.TimePickerClock: fixed time selection when the page is scrolled
We've have now introduced the enableDynamicHeight property for the tiles to expand dynamically when the content inside the tiles expands
sap.m.MultiInput: Do not delete tokens on RIGHT arrow navigation
